color: rgb(18, 18, 18); font-family: &quot;Guardian Text Egyptian Web&quot;, Georgia, serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-ligatures: common-ligatures; letter-spacing: normal;">Conceived by California-based gaming gurus&nbsp;<a href="https://www.riotgames.com/" data-link-name="in body link" class="u-underline" style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; touch-action: manipulation; color: rgb(107, 88, 64); cursor: pointer; border-bottom: 0.0625rem solid rgb(220, 220, 220); transition-timing-function: ease-out; transition-property: border-color;">Riot Games</a>&nbsp;in 2014, Pentakill exist purely in the imaginations of their creators – and the 100 million global fans of&nbsp;<a href="http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/" data-link-name="in body link" class="u-underline" style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; touch-action: manipulation; color: rgb(107, 88, 64); cursor: pointer; border-bottom: 0.0625rem solid rgb(220, 220, 220); transition-timing-function: ease-out; transition-property: border-color;">League of Legends</a>, the multiplayer online battle arena game that spawned the band’s members, Karthus the Deathsinger, Yorick, Sona, Olaf and lead guitarist Mordekaiser the Master of Metal.</p><p style="padding: 0px; color: rgb(18, 18, 18); font-family: &quot;Guardian Text Egyptian Web&quot;, Georgia, serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-ligatures: common-ligatures; letter-spacing: normal;">Entirely under the mainstream radar, the band’s new CGI video, Mortal Reminder, notched up more than 3m views in less than 48 hours after its release – and the new album, Grasp of the Undying, seems destined to be a huge success.</p><p style="padding: 0px; color: rgb(18, 18, 18); font-family: &quot;Guardian Text Egyptian Web&quot;, Georgia, serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-ligatures: common-ligatures; letter-spacing: normal;">“I think it’s entirely insanity as opposed to any sort of brilliance on our part,” says Viranda Tantula, a product manager at Riot&nbsp;<a href="https://www.theguardian.com/games" data-link-name="auto-linked-tag" data-component="auto-linked-tag" class="u-underline" style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; touch-action: manipulation; color: rgb(107, 88, 64); cursor: pointer; border-bottom: 0.0625rem solid rgb(220, 220, 220); transition-timing-function: ease-out; transition-property: border-color;">Games</a>. “When you think of a warlock like Karthus as a metal lead singer, or a berserker Viking like Olaf as a drummer, it all just seemed to make sense to us. We obviously had high hopes for this, but it’s not exactly territory we knew well when we began. We’re dying to see how the reception to the album pans out.”</p><figure class="element element-video fig--has-shares fig--narrow-caption" data-canonical-url="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5-mT9D4fdgQ" data-component="video-inbody-embed" style="margin-top: 0.25rem; font-size: 17px; font-variant-ligatures: common-ligatures; letter-spacing: normal;">Although the bulk of the work was done by Riot Games’ in-house composers and sound designers, the album also features collaborations with some of metal’s most respected musicians – there are cameos from the likes of&nbsp;<a href="http://www.tommylee.com/" data-link-name="in body link" class="u-underline" style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; touch-action: manipulation; color: rgb(107, 88, 64); cursor: pointer; border-bottom: 0.0625rem solid rgb(220, 220, 220); transition-timing-function: ease-out; transition-property: border-color;">Tommy Lee</a>,&nbsp;<a href="http://www.nin.com/" data-link-name="in body link" class="u-underline" style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; touch-action: manipulation; color: rgb(107, 88, 64); cursor: pointer; border-bottom: 0.0625rem solid rgb(220, 220, 220); transition-timing-function: ease-out; transition-property: border-color;">Nine Inch Nails</a>&nbsp;alumnus Danny Lohner and Noora Louhimo, singer with the Finnish metal band Battle Beast.</p><aside class="element element-rich-link element-rich-link--tag element--thumbnail element-rich-link--upgraded" data-component="rich-link-tag" data-link-name="rich-link-tag" style="float: left; color: rgb(18, 18, 18); font-family: &quot;Guardian Text Egyptian Web&quot;, Georgia, serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-ligatures: common-ligatures; letter-spacing: normal;">Grasp of the Undying is a surprisingly convincing and substantial modern metal record, even without its pixelated trimmings. Factor in the eye-popping visuals and explosive violence of League of Legends – witness the Mortal Reminder video for evidence – and Pentakill could hardly be more fitting (or preposterous) standard bearers for the love-in between gaming and metal fans, blurring the lines between so-called real music and digital fantasy in a way that no acts have managed before.</p><p style="padding: 0px; color: rgb(18, 18, 18); font-family: &quot;Guardian Text Egyptian Web&quot;, Georgia, serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-ligatures: common-ligatures; letter-spacing: normal;">“Is this the future? Alvin and the Chipmunks were way ahead of the game. They’ve been doing this since 1958!” laughs Tantula. “Even&nbsp;<a href="http://www.gorillaz.com/" data-link-name="in body link" class="u-underline" style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; touch-action: manipulation; color: rgb(107, 88, 64); cursor: pointer; border-bottom: 0.0625rem solid rgb(220, 220, 220); transition-timing-function: ease-out; transition-property: border-color;">Gorillaz</a>&nbsp;have been killin’ it for more than a decade now. But, regardless, once&nbsp;<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skynet_(Terminator)" data-link-name="in body link" class="u-underline" style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; touch-action: manipulation; color: rgb(107, 88, 64); cursor: pointer; border-bottom: 0.0625rem solid rgb(220, 220, 220); transition-timing-function: ease-out; transition-property: border-color;">Skynet</a>becomes sentient and replaces us, a virtual future is pretty much guaranteed. Right now, we just want to usher in a new era of metal domination!”</p><div class="after-article js-after-article" style="position: relative; content: &quot; &quot;; margin-top: 1.5rem; color: rgb(18, 18, 18); font-family: &quot;Guardian Text Egyptian Web&quot;, Georgia, serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-ligatures: common-ligatures; letter-spacing: normal;"></div><div class="contributions__epic " data-component="mem_acquisition_epic_kr1_epic_ask_four_earning_control" data-link-name="epic" style="border-top: 0.0625rem solid rgb(255, 229, 0); background-color: rgb(246, 246, 246); margin-top: 1.5rem; padding: 0.25rem 0.3125rem 0.75rem; color: rgb(18, 18, 18); font-family: &quot;Guardian Text Egyptian Web&quot;, Georgia, serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-ligatures: common-ligatures; letter-spacing: normal;"><div class=""><div><h2 class="contributions__title" style="margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0.75rem; margin-left: 0px; font-size: 1.25rem; line-height: 1.4375rem; font-family: &quot;Guardian Egyptian Web&quot;, Georgia, serif; font-weight: 900;">Since you’re here…</h2><p style="margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">… we have a small favour to ask. More people are reading and supporting our independent, investigative reporting than ever before. And unlike many news organisations, we have chosen an approach that allows us to keep our journalism accessible to all, regardless of where they live or what they can afford.</p><p style="margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">The Guardian is editorially independent, meaning we set our own agenda. Our journalism is free from commercial bias and not influenced by billionaire owners, politicians or shareholders. No one edits our editor. No one steers our opinion. This is important as it enables us to give a voice to those less heard, challenge the powerful and hold them to account. It’s what makes us different to so many others in the media, at a time when factual, honest reporting is critical.</p><p style="margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">Every contribution we receive from readers like you, big or small, goes directly into funding our journalism. This support enables us to keep working as we do – but we must maintain and build on it for every year to come.&nbsp;<strong style="font-weight: bold;"><span class="contributions__highlight" style="background-color: rgb(255, 229, 0); padding: 0.125rem;">Support The Guardian from as little as $1 – and it only takes a minute. Thank you.</span></strong></p></div><div class="contributions__buttons" style="display: flex; flex-flow: row wrap; margin-top: 1.5rem; align-items: center;"><a class="contributions__option-button contributions__contribute contributions__contribute--epic contributions__contribute--epic-member" href="https://support.theguardian.com/contribute?REFPVID=jvzf9ghkwzw258wytl4j&amp;INTCMP=gdnwb_copts_memco_kr1_epic_ask_four_earning_control&amp;acquisitionData=%7B%22source%22%3A%22GUARDIAN_WEB%22%2C%22componentId%22%3A%22gdnwb_copts_memco_kr1_epic_ask_four_earning_control%22%2C%22componentType%22%3A%22ACQUISITIONS_EPIC%22%2C%22campaignCode%22%3A%22gdnwb_copts_memco_kr1_epic_ask_four_earning_control%22%2C%22abTest%22%3A%7B%22name%22%3A%22ContributionsEpicAskFourEarning%22%2C%22variant%22%3A%22control%22%7D%2C%22referrerPageviewId%22%3A%22jvzf9ghkwzw258wytl4j%22%2C%22referrerUrl%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.theguardian.com%2Fmusic%2Fshortcuts%2F2017%2Faug%2F06%2Fpentakill-how-a-metal-band-that-doesnt-exist-made-it-to-no-1%22%7D" target="_blank" style="background: rgb(255, 229, 0); touch-action: manipulation; color: rgb(18, 18, 18); cursor: pointer; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; font-family: &quot;Guardian Text Sans Web&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Lucida Grande&quot;, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; display: inline-block; vertical-align: bottom; outline: none; border: 0px; border-radius: 62.5rem; margin: 0px 0.625rem 0.25rem 0px; padding: 0.5em 0px 0.5em 0.9375rem;">Support The Guardian</a></div></div></div>
